tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  clothing_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_item (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category_id INT,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  size VARCHAR(10),
  color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES clothing_category(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_arrival (
  arrival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  arrival_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_item(item_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES clothing_supplier(supplier_id)
);
